job.title: Data Scientist/Machine Learning Engineer, NLP
job.description: ltstronggtHealthTech startup based out of Palo Alto CAltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtThis Jobot Job is hosted by Christina FinsterltbrgtltbrgtAre you a fit Easy Apply now by clicking the Apply button and sending us your resumeltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtA Bit About UsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtOur clients mission is to provide Earths 73 billion citizens with control of their complete health information and give them the choice of sharing it with whomever they wantltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWhy join usltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtPerksltbrgtltbrgtOn a mission to revolutionize healthcareltbrgtltbrgtCulture of doersltbrgtltbrgtVenturebacked Series A equityltbrgtltbrgtGenerous Benefits Discretionary Time OffltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtJob DetailsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtIn this role you will be working with other data scientists and engineers to help build our unstructured data extraction pipeline You will be responsible for leveraging the latest machine learning and natural language processing technology to structure and normalize data from medical records The ideal candidate will have no issue digging into messy data working with clinical subject matter experts to develop annotation guidelines to produce highquality machine learning modelsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtRequirementsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggt2 years experience prototyping and deploying production NLP  Machine Learning modelsltbrgtltbrgt3 years experience with Python and solid software development skillsltbrgtltbrgtFamiliarity with common NLPML frameworks Spacy Pytorch TensorFlow KerasltbrgtltbrgtFluency in stateoftheart machine learning techniques including Transformers CNNs RNNs to solve NLP tasks like Named Entity Recognition Information Extraction Named Entity LinkingltbrgtltbrgtExcellent ability to communicate technical information to nontechnical audiencesltbrgtltbrgtOnly accepting US Based applicants at this timeltbrgtltbrgtInterested in hearing more Easy Apply now by clicking the Apply buttonltbrgtltbrgt
